thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: Ryan Burke

author: Ryan Burke
title: Ryan Burke
text: Now that i have seen the smile on my clients face, i am happy to give my honest review of sportsmemorabilia.com. Website is great, ordering is easy, all things needed to sell a product online. What i would like comment on is the service after the sale. I purchased something that was time sensitive. I needed it quickly and that is what i got. The service dept was great (Genevieve in particular). They kept me up to date on shipping and followed through on what they had promised. 5 stars!
